required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Look at Performance of MICRUSFRAME and GALAXY Coils for the Treatment of Intracranial Aneurysms
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective, Multi-center, Single Arm Study to Obtain "Real World" Clinical Data and Characterize the Acute and Long-term Performance of the MICRUSFRAME and GALAXY Coils Including the PulseRider Aneurysm Neck Reconstruction Device for the Endovascular Treatment of Intracranial Aneurysms

lead_sponsor.agency: Cerenovus, Part of DePuy Synthes Products, Inc.

clinical_study.source: Cerenovus, Part of DePuy Synthes Products, Inc.

brief_summary.textblock: A post-market registry evaluating ruptured/unruptured aneurysms treated with MICRUSFRAME and GALAXY coils

detailed_description.textblock: A registry to collect real world data on the use of Cerenovus coils. The study will be a post-market registry evaluating ruptured/unruptured aneurysms treated with MICRUSFRAME and GALAXY coils

primary_outcome.description: Occlusion rate at 12 Months post procedure

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From enrollment to end of treatment at 12 months
secondary_outcome.description: Packing density will be evaluated based on aneurysm volume and the coils used during the procedure.
Complete occlusion rate at 12 month follow-up
Recanalization Rate: Any worsening of occlusion grading at 12 Month follow-up
Any device related serious adverse events will be reported through 12 month follow-up
Aneurysm re-treatment rates will be tracked and recorded during the 12 month follow-up

Modified Rankin Score (Scale from 0-6) at 12 Months. 0 - No symptoms. - No significant disability. Able to carry out all usual activities, despite some symptoms. - Slight disability. Able to look after own affairs without assistance, but unable to carry out all previous activities. - Moderate disability. Requires some help, but able to walk unassisted. - Moderately severe disability. Unable to attend to own bodily needs without assistance, and unable to walk unassisted. - Severe disability. Requires constant nursing care and attention, bedridden, incontinent. - Dead.
Hospital stay length will be recorded

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Patient is between 21 and 80 years of age
2. Patient has an intracranial saccular aneurysm, ruptured or unruptured, suitable for embolization with coils
3. Patient is able and willing to comply with protocol and follow-up requirements
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Pre-planned staged procedure on unruptured aneurysm
2. More than one aneurysm requiring treatment during the course of study
3. Fusiform aneurysm

facility.name: Mercy Health St. Vincent Medical Center
